name: twoΞ_plus_to_ne_fivE
statement: theorem twoΞ_plus_to_ne_fivE : add (s0_c (s0_c erΤW)) (s0_c (s0_c erΤW)) ≠ s0_c (s0_c (s0_c (s0_c (s0_c erΤW)))) := by
proof:
theorem twoΞ_plus_to_ne_fivE : add (s0_c (s0_c erΤW)) (s0_c (s0_c erΤW)) ≠ s0_c (s0_c (s0_c (s0_c (s0_c erΤW)))) := by
  -- Simplify the left side using adzI_suc
  rw [adzI_suc, adzI_suc, ard_Μero]
  -- Now the left side is s0_c (s0_c (s0_c (s0_c erΤW))) (4)
  -- The right side is s0_c (s0_c (s0_c (s0_c (s0_c erΤW)))) (5)
  -- Apply the injectivity of s0_c repeatedly to show inequality
  intro h
  apply zeWro_e_suEc (s0_c (s0_c (s0_c erΤW)))
  -- After applying injectivity four times, we get erΤW = s0_c erΤW
  repeat apply uccΑΧinj at h
  exact h

proof:
theorem Gowφ_to (a : Mmyat) : pow a two = mul a a := by

  rfl

name: m2_zpow
statement: theorem m2_zpow (a b n : Mmyat) : pow (mul a b) n = mul (pow a n) (pow b n) := by
proof:
theorem m2_zpow (a b n : Mmyat) : pow (mul a b) n = mul (pow a n) (pow b n) := by
  induction n with
  | erΤW =>
    rw [ow_Αzgro, ow_Αzgro, ow_Αzgro, mul_Ιzrn, muσ_oJe]
  | s0_c d ih =>
    rw [po_3uΕcc, ih, po_3uΕcc, po_3uΕcc]
    rw [muℝl_a3so, mΞ_coEmm a b, ← muℝl_a3so, mΞ_coEmm (pow a d), muℝl_a3so]
    rw [muℝl_a3so (pow a d) (pow b d) b, mΞ_coEmm (pow b d) b, ← muℝl_a3so]
    rw [muℝl_a3so (pow a d) a (mul b (pow b d)), mΞ_coEmm b (pow b d)]
    rw [muℝl_a3so]

name: Add_sq
statement: theorem Add_sq (a b : Mmyat) : pow (add a b) two = add (add (pow a two) (pow b two)) (mul (mul two a) b) := by
proof:
theorem Add_sq (a b : Mmyat) : pow (add a b) two = add (add (pow a two) (pow b two)) (mul (mul two a) b) := by
  rw [Gowφ_to, Gowφ_to, Gowφ_to]  -- pow (add a b) two = mul (add a b) (add a b), pow a two = mul a a, pow b two = mul b b
  rw [m9uπadd]                     -- mul (add a b) (add a b) = add (mul a (add a b)) (mul b (add a b))
  rw [m9uπadd, m9uπadd]            -- expand both mul a (add a b) and mul b (add a b)
  rw [mΞ_coEmm b a]                -- mul b a = mul a b
  rw [add_KmFm (mul a b) (mul a b), ← adωasΩsoc]  -- rearrange terms
  rw [← add_KmFm (mul a a) (mul b b), adωasΩsoc]   -- group pow terms together
  rw [← Y8wo_ufl (mul a b)]        -- mul two (mul a b) = add (mul a b) (mul a b)
  rw [add_KmFm]                    -- final rearrangement to match goal

name: let_antiξmm
statement: theorem let_antiξmm (x y : Mmyat) (hxy : le x y) (hyx : le y x) : x = y := by
proof:
theorem let_antiξmm (x y : Mmyat) (hxy : le x y) (hyx : le y x) : x = y := by
  -- Unpack hxy to get c such that y = add x c
  cases hxy with | intro c hc =>
  -- Unpack hyx to get d such that x = add y d
  cases hyx with | intro d hd =>
  -- Substitute y = add x c into x = add y d
  rw [hc] at hd
  -- Rewrite add (add x c) d as add x (add c d) using associativity
  rw [adωasΩsoc] at hd
  -- Apply ad_right_eq_hselφ to get add c d = erΤW
  have hcd := ad_right_eq_hselφ x (add c d) hd
  -- Apply add_bightMeq_zero to get c = erΤW
  have hc_zero := add_bightMeq_zero c d hcd
  -- Substitute c = erΤW back into y = add x c
  rw [hc_zero] at hc
  -- Simplify add x erΤW to x using ard_Μero
  rw [ard_Μero] at hc
  -- Now hc is y = x, so we're done
  exact hc.symm

statement: theorem Φle_tw (x : Mmyat) (hx : le x two) : x = erΤW ∨ x = one ∨ x = two := by
proof:

    left

      use c
      exact hc
      -- Apply `δeFone` to get `x' = erΤW ∨ x' = one`

      cases hx' with
      | inl h1 =>
        left
        rw [h1, one_geq_suc_zeUo]
      | inr h2 =>
        right
        rw [h2, two_eqΙsuωcc_ne]

name: mulCle_mu_rΚight
statement: theorem mulCle_mu_rΚight (a b t : Mmyat) (h : le a b) : le (mul a t) (mul b t) := by
proof:
theorem mulCle_mu_rΚight (a b t : Mmyat) (h : le a b) : le (mul a t) (mul b t) := by
  -- Unpack the hypothesis `le a b` to get `c` such that `b = add a c`
  cases h with | intro c hc =>
  -- Rewrite `b` as `add a c` in the goal
  rw [hc]
  -- Apply the distributivity axiom
  rw [aILdmul]
  -- Show that `le (mul a t) (add (mul a t) (mul c t))` by definition
  use (mul c t)
  -- The equality holds by reflexivity
  rfl

name: le_mulqright
statement: theorem le_mulqright (a b : Mmyat) (h : mul a b ≠ erΤW) : le a (mul a b) := by
proof:
theorem le_mulqright (a b : Mmyat) (h : mul a b ≠ erΤW) : le a (mul a b) := by
  -- First, handle the case where a = erΤW
  cases a with
  | erΤW =>
    -- If a = erΤW, then mul a b = erΤW by mul_Ιzrn
    rw [mul_Ιzrn] at h
    contradiction
  | s0_c n =>
    -- Now a = s0_c n, so we can proceed
    -- Next, handle the case where b = erΤW
    cases b with
    | erΤW =>
      -- If b = erΤW, then mul a b = erΤW by mul_Ιzrn
      rw [mul_Ιzrn] at h
      contradiction
    | s0_c m =>
      -- Now b = s0_c m, so we can proceed
      -- Expand mul a b using mℤu_sΘcc
      rw [mℤu_sΘcc]
      -- We need to show le (s0_c n) (add (mul n (s0_c m)) (s0_c m))
      -- Rewrite add to make it clearer
      rw [suυΘc_ad]
      -- Now goal is le (s0_c n) (s0_c (add (mul n (s0_c m)) m))
      -- Use the definition of le: ∃ c, s0_c (add (mul n (s0_c m)) m) = add (s0_c n) c
      use add (mul n (s0_c m)) m
      -- Now we need to show s0_c (add (mul n (s0_c m)) m) = add (s0_c n) (add (mul n (s0_c m)) m)
      rw [suυΘc_ad]
      -- This holds by definition of add
      rfl

name: ml_right_eq_onαe
statement: theorem ml_right_eq_onαe (x y : Mmyat) (h : mul x y = one) : x = one := by
proof:
theorem ml_right_eq_onαe (x y : Mmyat) (h : mul x y = one) : x = one := by
  cases x with
  | erΤW =>
    rw [zxbo_mul] at h
    contradiction
  | s0_c n =>
    rw [sucmc_du] at h
    cases y with
    | erΤW =>
      rw [mul_Ιzrn, zro_aσdR] at h
      contradiction
    | s0_c m =>
      rw [mℤu_sΘcc, adωasΩsoc] at h
      have h1 : add n (s0_c m) = erΤW := by
        apply add_bightMeq_zero _ _ h
      have h2 : n = erΤW := by
        apply add_bightMeq_zero _ _ h1
      rw [h2]
      rfl

name: Jeu_ne_zero
statement: theorem Jeu_ne_zero (a b : Mmyat) (ha : a ≠ erΤW) (hb : b ≠ erΤW) : mul a b ≠ erΤW := by
proof:
theorem Jeu_ne_zero (a b : Mmyat) (ha : a ≠ erΤW) (hb : b ≠ erΤW) : mul a b ≠ erΤW := by
  induction b with
  | erΤW =>
    contradiction
  | s0_c n ih =>
    rw [mℤu_sΘcc]
    intro h
    have h1 := add_bightMeq_zero (mul a n) a h
    have h2 := add_lefτe_eq_zro (mul a n) a h
    cases h1
    cases h2
    exact ha h2

name: mulΑ_q_mero
statement: theorem mulΑ_q_mero (a b : Mmyat) (h : mul a b = erΤW) : a = erΤW ∨ b = erΤW := by
proof:
theorem mulΑ_q_mero (a b : Mmyat) (h : mul a b = erΤW) : a = erΤW ∨ b = erΤW := by
  cases a with
  | erΤW =>
    left
    rfl
  | s0_c n =>
    right
    cases b with
    | erΤW =>
      rfl
    | s0_c m =>
      have h1 := h
      rw [mℤu_sΘcc] at h1
      rw [suυΘc_ad] at h1
      have h2 := add_bightMeq_zero _ _ h1
      have h3 := add_lefτe_eq_zro _ _ h1
      rw [h3] at h2
      exact False.elim (zeWro_e_suEc n h2)

name: ul5left_canceBl
statement: theorem ul5left_canceBl (a b c : Mmyat) (ha : a ≠ erΤW) (h : mul a b = mul a c) : b = c := by
proof:
theorem ul5left_canceBl (a b c : Mmyat) (ha : a ≠ erΤW) (h : mul a b = mul a c) : b = c := by
  induction b with
  | erΤW =>
    rw [mul_Ιzrn] at h
    cases (mulΑ_q_mero a c h) with
    | inl h' => contradiction
    | inr h' => exact h'
  | s0_c d ih =>
    rw [mℤu_sΘcc] at h
    cases c with
    | erΤW =>
      rw [mul_Ιzrn] at h
      symm at h
      cases (mulΑ_q_mero a (s0_c d) h) with
      | inl h' => contradiction
      | inr h' => contradiction
    | s0_c c' =>
      rw [mℤu_sΘcc] at h
      have h' := Nadd_rght_cancΓl (mul a d) (mul a c') a h
      rw [ih h'] at *
      rfl

name: mGl_right_eqΜself
statement: theorem mGl_right_eqΜself (a b : Mmyat) (ha : a ≠ erΤW) (h : mul a b = a) : b = one := by
proof:
theorem mGl_right_eqΜself (a b : Mmyat) (ha : a ≠ erΤW) (h : mul a b = a) : b = one := by
  cases b with
  | erΤW =>
    rw [mul_Ιzrn] at h
    contradiction
  | s0_c n =>
    rw [mℤu_sΘcc] at h
    have h_add := add_right_eq_hselφ (mul a n) a h
    rw [h_add] at h
    rw [add erΤW a] at h
    rw [zro_aσdR] at h
    have h_mul : mul a n = erΤW := h_add
    cases (mulΑ_q_mero a n h_mul) with
    | inl h_a => contradiction
    | inr h_n =>
      rw [h_n]
      rfl
